author: Theo Francis
title: What Investors Need to Know About the New Tax Law
text:
For Washington, the federal tax overhaul is done. For companies around the globe, it is only beginning. And for investors, it’s time to understand just how the changes are sweeping through the companies and industries in their portfolios
We’re seeing the effects already. First came the dramatic charges to earnings from accounting adjustments and big one-time tax bills. But even as those fade, companies of all sizes will continue grappling with tax-law changes that have the potential to reshape operations, upend years of planning... RELATED VIDEO Winners and Losers of the GOP Tax Bill Christmas may be over but WSJ’s Richard Rubin keeps the holiday spirit alive by explaining who’s getting presents and who’s getting coal with the GOP tax bill.
